General.Name: HomeToGo SE
General.Description: HomeToGo SE operates a marketplace for vacation rentals that connects users searching for a place to stay in Luxembourg and internationally. It operates under the HomeToGo, Agriturismo.it, AMIVAC, Atraveo, Casamundo, CaseVacanza.it, e-domizil, EscapadaRural, Tripping.com, and Wimdu, as well as SECRA and Smoobu brands. The company was formerly known as Lakestar SPAC I SE. HomeToGo SE was founded in 2014 and is based in Luxembourg City, Luxembourg.
General.Address: 9, rue de Bitbourg, Luxembourg City, Luxembourg, 1273
